name: Teal Tumblr Dashboard
description:
For resolutions 1280px wide and below (change body's background if bigger).

Follow me here>>> ( http://deveerei.tumblr.com )

Full post about this skin here>>> (http://layoutsbydev.tumblr.com/post/1213379650/tumblr-teal-dashboard-goes-with-facebook-light)

Skin only works in dashboard, reblogs, and new posts. Doesn't work on tumblelog's pages.


To those who edited my codes and uploaded them here in userstyles with proper credits or with a link back to this page, thank you.

user.name: deveerei
user.about: Disclaimers: All or some images of my userstyles belong to other people and please tell me if I didn't credited them properly due to my irresponsibility. Contact me @ http://deveerei.tumblr.com/ask (I'm inactive and I can't reply asap)
